q: At the time, President Bush rejected two resignation letters, five days apart, from Donald Rumsfeld . Another 21/2 years passed before President Bush , facing the Republicans' loss of Congress, decided to let Donald Rumsfeld go. Looking back, I see there are things the administration could have done differently and better with respect to wartime detention, Donald Rumsfeld acknowledges. Donald Rumsfeld argues that the administration was wrong to have been so focused on preserving presidential powers that it initially eschewed negotiations with Congress in formulating detainee policy. her "brand" with fans. England footballer Ashley, Cheryl Cole , 27, had continued to travel and book hotels under her maiden name. Last night a source close to the X Factor host said: Cheryl Cole considered going back to her maiden name but now she has dismissed the idea. People knew who she was as a Cheryl Cole but she has only become truly famous as Cheryl Cole . yet but seeds have been sown by people like Black Eyed Peas singer Will.i.am and it is important she creates a lasting brand. It would be madness to change back. The Sunday Mirror can also confirm that Simon Cowell has promised her a job as a judge on the US X Factor. He has spent the past few days convincing American producers that she will be a huge success.

Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, "The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't." Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments

the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Denver Nuggets 108-97 Tuesday night in Allen Iverson 's first game against his former team. It was weird to see him wearing a white jersey and we're wearing black," Kyle Korver said. I said to one of our coaches that it is so weird to see him on the other side. It wasn't really a good feeling at all. He's a great player and he meant a lot to Philadelphia. Allen Iverson scored 30 points on 10-of-24 shooting before getting tossed for his second technical with 1:44 remaining. Afterward, he said the loss disappointed him because he feels the Nuggets are the better team. Allen Iverson 's best shots

stepping down as he "pursues other interests outside the company". Nokia is betting heavily that they can speed up company operations. In a joint release by Nokia CEO Stephen Elop and Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , Today, the battle is moving from one of mobile devices to one of mobile ecosystems, and our strengths here are complementary. Ecosystems thrive when they reach scale, when they are fueled by energy and innovation and when they provide benefits and value to each person or company who participates. This is what we are creating; this is our vision; this is the work we are driving from this day forward. There are other mobile ecosystems. We will disrupt them. There will be challenges. We will overcome them. Success requires speed. We will be swift. Together, we

". As Google's new chief executive, Page will lead product development and technology strategy, along with all day-to-day operations of the firm. Sergey Brin , who co-founded Google with Page, will devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will remain co-founder. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said that he had been working with Page and Sergey Brin on ways to simplify Google's management structure and quicken decision making.
